amendment.description: To amend title 32, United States Code, to provide for the use of members of the National Guard on fulltime National Guard duty for carrying out homeland security activities in support of Federal agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3285 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3285 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980) To amend title 32, United States Code, to provide for the use of members of the National Guard on fulltime National Guard duty for carrying out homeland security activities in support of Federal agencies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3285 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3285 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Leahy.
